title: blitzcrank or darius
body:
I wanted to buy darius but i think blitz is also a good champ. i think i made up a decision if anyone gift me dunkmaster darius i ill main darius for the rest of my life. It is ok if noone wants to gift me dunkmaster darius it is fine. I just anted to ask you guys for a choice.
:)

replies.body: Begging people for skins? Pathetic, get out of here kid.
you are so easily triggered and i bet you are the kid and you are reported
What? This post is 5 months old why are you still here?
you are so easily triggered and i bet you are the kid
Dude calm down. The point he wanted to make was that you don't ask others for skins. That's just asking others for money. And you can't report someone for something like this. Downvoted

wrong discussion buddy
this is player creations,
best going to Miscellaneous
